doc.name: screenVendor
doc.summary: Returns version information about the producer of the windowing software.

examples.example: if the screenVendor is originalVendor then pass mouseUp

description.p: Use the screenVendor function to get information about the XWindows software version.
The screenVendor function returns a string.
The return value usually includes the company or organization that produced the screen driver, along with version information.
